articles.description: Recession fears may be looming in Asia-Pacific, but that has not stopped firms in India, Australia and Singapore from continuing to hire talent, says LinkedIn.
articles.content:
Recession fears may be looming in Asia-Pacific, but that hasn't stopped companies in India, Australia and Singapore from continuing their hiring spree, according to LinkedIn. 
As economies reopened … [+3074 chars]
